title: [Medicine] Obesity is associated with altered circadian metabolism - people with obesity burn less energy during day. People who have a healthy weight use more energy during the day, when most people are active and eat, while those who have obesity spend more energy during the night, when most people sleep.

[Medicine] Scientists 3D-print hair follicles in lab-grown skin for the first time. Hair follicles are important as they produce sweat, help regulate body temperature, and contain stem cells that help skin heal. This has potential applications in regenerative medicine.
